name: Once Upon a Time (itch) (PerIta Soft)
description:
Very short point and click narrative game for the Narrative Driven Jam #9. The theme was “warm feelings”.

It tries to convey a slice of life from a couple and their daughter. One parent is at times too involved in the bedtime stories for her, to the point of making them own. The daughter does not lack imagination, either.

I had to rush to “complete” it in time for the jam, with just 10 days, so it is a bit rough around the edges—mind your fingers!

I am very sorry for the low quality of the art and the writing. This is definitively not due to the short deadline, unfortunately.

Sigh.

Music
